name: Escaping The Anomaly
description:
You are astronaut that woke up in mysterious crash site. You need to find your ship to escape this weird place but be careful because one decision in one room may affect other rooms too.

Controls:

W, A, S, D or Arrows to move

Esc to pause 

Made solo in 6 days for Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1

Credits:

Music by SpiderDave https://opengameart.org/users/spiderdave
